content:
@Yury Delendik do you want me to take a look at #2064? (wasn't sure if you were waiting for me or someone else)

Reuse ELF image from code_memory by yurydelendik 路 Pull Request #2064 路 bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Optimization for #2020 Changes: Places entire ELF image into code_memory Use code_memory data as a source for wasm_module_serialize instead keeping pristine copy in memory Use code_memory data as ...
Yes. I did not assign anyone, but if you have time, I would like to hear a feedback.
Maybe it is not ideal solution, but it moves us close to what we want.
ok, I'll take a look later today
